verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* follows \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w unintentionally|strong="H7684"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* forbidden \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*:

\w If|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, bringing guilt \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* must bring \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H7819"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

just \w as|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fat \w is|strong="H3548"\w* \w removed|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*. \w Then|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hide|strong="H5785"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*—

\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*—\w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H2351"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* \w are|strong="H1880"\w* \w poured|strong="H8211"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H2351"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* fire \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ash heap.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5795"\w* \w becomes|strong="H3045"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H2403"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H5795"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, \w he|strong="H5795"\w* must \w bring|strong="H2398"\w* \w an|strong="H2145"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w as|strong="H2403"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.
